template.name: Selected Playlists
template.description: Library limited by selecting a number of playlists

parameter.name: Limit to playlists
parameter.data: select tracks.id,tracks.title,tracks.title from tracks join playlist_track on tracks.id=playlist_track.playlist where tracks.content_type not in ('cpl','cue') group by tracks.id order by tracks.titlesort

parameter.name: Only include on these players (empty = all)
